body.raw: I've had the pleasure of collaborating with Novin on various projects and their dedication to backend engineering using PHP and Spring is truly commendable. Their recent shift towards data-related domains showcases their versatility and thirst for knowledge, making them a valuable asset in any technological endeavor.
